name: context7
title: Context7
description: Up-to-date documentation for any library directly in your prompts

authorization.description: Optional API key for higher rate limits and priority access. Works without a key but may be rate-limited.

tools.name: resolve_library_id
tools.title: Resolve Library
tools.description: Resolves a library name to a Context7-compatible library ID. Always call this first before fetching documentation.

libraryName.description: The name of the library to search for (e.g., 'react', 'nextjs', 'postgres')

tools.name: get_library_docs
tools.title: Get Documentation
tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library. Use the library ID from resolve_library_id.

topic.description: Optional: Focus the documentation on a specific topic
